description: This file defines the main application route component for the notes app frontend, including loader logic, fetching user data, and rendering search and note list components.

methods.name: loader
methods.description: Asynchronous function to load data required for the route, including user session info and search/filter params.

methods.name: AppIndexRoute
methods.description: React component implementing the main notes application interface, with search, filtering, and notes list display.
